attributes.action: Public inquiry into causes and consequences of mass third world immigration
attributes.additional_details:
Why have successive governments allowed mass immigration into our already, natively and unsustainably, overpopulated country, thereby undermining the natural ethnic foundations of our national identity? Was this, perhaps, the ideological purpose of it?

Why was Enoch Powell, who tried to warn us of the consequences of mass immigration hounded from mainstream politics as a "racist"?
